definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Beware India, the hotlines may turn too hot to handle in the future.
sentences.chinese: 印度要小心，热线也许未来会变成烫手山芋。

sentences.english: They took with them dogs, rats and plants like the sweet potato.
sentences.chinese: 他们带着他们的狗，鼠以及象山芋之类的植物。

sentences.english: Immediately your nose is filled with the aroma of hot tea and roast sweet potatoes.
sentences.chinese: 烧山芋和热茶的香味，便一下子扑人你的鼻子。

sentences.english: And potato, rice cakes, green onions, ginger, and fry.
sentences.chinese: 和山芋，年糕，大葱，生姜等一起炒。

sentences.english: They will do anything they can to drop her like a hot potato.
sentences.chinese: 他们会想尽办法把她这个烫手山芋给甩掉。

sentences.english: Getting reconstruction aid into Gaza will be tricky.
sentences.chinese: 将重建援助输入加沙会是一个“烫手山芋”。

sentences.english: The Mideast conflict is really a hot potato for all politicians around the world.
sentences.chinese: 中东问题对世界所有的政治家来说都是个烫手的山芋。

sentences.english: Eritrea has always been a bit of a hot potato.
sentences.chinese: 厄立特里亚也确实有点像烫手山芋。

sentences.english: Reyes now finds himself in limbo.
sentences.chinese: 雷耶斯现在觉得自己成了烫手的山芋。

sentences.english: All above content bothers past master to translate the once , burning-hot sweet potato.
sentences.chinese: 以上内容麻烦高手翻译一下，烫手山芋。

sentences.english: In the meantime, passing the buck like a hot potato does not work.
sentences.chinese: 同时，将美元像个烫手山芋一样推出去是做不到的。

sentences.english: I'm such a hot potato that she'll really get burned.
sentences.chinese: 捧著像我这样的烫手山芋，她可真的会烫伤。

definition: radish (Raphanus sativus), esp. white radish 白蘿蔔|白萝卜[bai2 luo2 bo5]/CL:條|条[tiao2]
